entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
